channel.title: BattleScape By Palidino76 [Mod Damo Fixed it for everyone]
channel.description:
[center][b]Please post atleast a thanks or a comment if you do or do not download... It will make me feel good about myself. I made this for those lazy kids out there. Guys this "anti leech" is just a failed logging system, so instead of removing the logging of the commands just ctrl+f[/b] [code]public void ReadCommandStrings()[/code] [b]and replace the first 3 lines with[/b] [code]public void ReadCommandStrings() { String Command = inStream.readString(); writeLog("" + playerName + " command: " + Command + "", "PlayerCommands");[/code] [b]Then find[/b] [code]ReadCommandStrings();[/code] [b]and replace the method with[/b] [code]case 103: //This packet loads commands. ReadCommandStrings(); break;[/code] [b]Compile and enjoy the server![/b] [b]Credits To pyrofox69 For the anti leached fixed.[/b]
[b] Features I Added To BattleScape Source Palidino76 Perfect Combat. NPC NOCLIPPING IS FIXED! I Moved Slayer Cave To Slayer Tower. Player Following is perfect now. Remove MySQL 100% Fixed Logged Glitch Fixed Teleports with 5 options to go too. Added new Home at Entrana. Added better shops. Added Assault minigame. Added Agility and Farming. Added Highscores for website. Fixed Max xp. Only goes to 200m xp now. Made it say in the yell when you hit 90+ stats. Added more great commands. Made all the quests completed and don't show in quest tab. Fixed the screen delay glitch. (when you walk in wildy it says Level: faster. Minigames I added are Wolf Game, Ghost Game, Zombie Game, Duel Tournament. I added skilling area so easy for everyone. I added Delete Objects. I fix the objects disappear glitch. Mod and Admin crowns are fixed. You are member when you logged on. I fixed the password bugged. No more lag anymore. Run smoothy on a 4 gig computer.[/b]
[b]Commands Added By Me Normal Player Controls / - Use that symbol to talk in clan chat. ::changepassword newpasswordhere - Change your password. ::defreset - Reset your def to 1. ::resetbarrows - Reset your barrows if your glitch. Administrator & Moderator Controls ::mute playerName - mutes a desired player. ::unmute playerName - unmutes a desired player. ::viewmuted - view all online muted players. ::yell - talk to the online players. ::empty - empty your inventory. ::teleto playerName - teleports you to the desired player. ::banuser playerName - banned a desired player. ::unban playerName - unbanned a desired player. Owner Controls ::item ::bank ;:spec ::tele ::coords ::npc ::pnpc ::unpnpc[/b]
[b]Server Pictures:[/b] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/14n1qh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hecxso.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/6xw6e1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2m0enb.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/wvsu0w.jpg[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/smsv0j.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/eznyft.jpg[/img] [img]http://ttp://i49.tinypic.com/289x25w.jpg[/img] [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2lidipy&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2lidipy&s=5[/url][b]Wildyness Obelisks 100%[/b] [b]Server Download Link:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/v/6MMWTBPP]http://uppit.com/v/6MMWTBPP[/url] [b]Client Download Link:[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?zquizyiqju0]http://www.mediafire.com/?zquizyiqju0[/url] [b]Credits: Palidino76 80% Mod Damo 20% [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/5n7psg.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/289x25w.jpg[/img] I RELEASED THIS SERVER ON google! IM DAMIEN FROM rune server!![/b][/center]

item.description:
@mod_damo wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:13, topic:335454”][quote author=mod damo link=topic=431836.msg3169936#msg3169936 date=1270345432]

Good job, get a picture with me in it again viewing your thread.

Were you viewing my thread on rune server?

Yeah Jmood126.

You did good with this. Have a little rep with your dinner tonight.

Thank you mate. I add this picture for you,

289x25w.jpg1301×62

[/quote]

I like seeing that picture, because I am in it. :P[/quote]

It’s all good mate.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape By Palidino76 [Mod Damo Fixed it for everyone]
item.dc:creator: @mod_damo mod damo
item.description:
@mod_damo wrote:

[center][b]Please post atleast a thanks or a comment if you do or do not download… It will make me feel good about myself.

I made this for those lazy kids out there.

Guys this “anti leech” is just a failed logging system, so instead of removing the logging of the commands just ctrl+f[/b]

public void ReadCommandStrings()

and replace the first 3 lines with

public void ReadCommandStrings() { String Command = inStream.readString(); writeLog("" + playerName + " command: " + Command + "", "PlayerCommands");

Then find

ReadCommandStrings();

and replace the method with

case 103: //This packet loads commands. ReadCommandStrings(); break;

Compile and enjoy the server!

Credits To pyrofox69 For the anti leached fixed.

[b] Features I Added To BattleScape Source Palidino76 Perfect Combat. NPC NOCLIPPING IS FIXED! I Moved Slayer Cave To Slayer Tower. Player Following is perfect now. Remove MySQL 100% Fixed Logged Glitch Fixed Teleports with 5 options to go too. Added new Home at Entrana. Added better shops. Added Assault minigame. Added Agility and Farming. Added Highscores for website. Fixed Max xp. Only goes to 200m xp now. Made it say in the yell when you hit 90+ stats. Added more great commands. Made all the quests completed and don't show in quest tab. Fixed the screen delay glitch. (when you walk in wildy it says Level: faster. Minigames I added are Wolf Game, Ghost Game, Zombie Game, Duel Tournament. I added skilling area so easy for everyone. I added Delete Objects. I fix the objects disappear glitch. Mod and Admin crowns are fixed. You are member when you logged on. I fixed the password bugged. No more lag anymore. Run smoothy on a 4 gig computer.[/b]
[b]Commands Added By Me Normal Player Controls / - Use that symbol to talk in clan chat. ::changepassword newpasswordhere - Change your password. ::defreset - Reset your def to 1. ::resetbarrows - Reset your barrows if your glitch. Administrator & Moderator Controls ::mute playerName - mutes a desired player. ::unmute playerName - unmutes a desired player. ::viewmuted - view all online muted players. ::yell - talk to the online players. ::empty - empty your inventory. ::teleto playerName - teleports you to the desired player. ::banuser playerName - banned a desired player. ::unban playerName - unbanned a desired player. Owner Controls ::item ::bank ;:spec ::tele ::coords ::npc ::pnpc ::unpnpc[/b]

Server Pictures:





smsv0j.jpg761×494

eznyft.jpg762×498


http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2lidipy&s=5Wildyness Obelisks 100%

Server Download Link:
http://uppit.com/v/6MMWTBPP

Client Download Link:
http://www.mediafire.com/?zquizyiqju0

Credits:
Palidino76 80%
Mod Damo 20%

5n7psg.png973×299

289x25w.jpg1301×62

I RELEASED THIS SERVER ON google! IM DAMIEN FROM rune server!![/center]

Read full topic
